channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL

item.title: Supreme Court seems skeptical of Hawaii limits on carrying guns
item.description: The Hawaii case before the Supreme Court could have a major impact on gun laws in California, New York and elsewhere.

item.title: Trump’s deeply unpopular presidency so far
item.description: A year after his inauguration, polls show he’s as unpopular as ever and many Americans dislike his major policies.

item.description: The planned exit marks the Trump administration’s latest move to scale back Washington’s military investment in Europe’s defense.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
